alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:41PM EST until January 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers increase through the evening. Blowing and drifting snow will continue to produce significant impacts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
